short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A revolutionary plugin for me_irl, to change all instances of 'no' to 'yesn't'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's a simple plugin for simple memers that changes every instance of no into yesn't. May sometimes break page css because I'm an idiot but hey should be fun for like 5 minutes and I only really made this to get karma on reddit. :)
